description: Fjallraven's prize-winning Abisko Midsummer Trousers, here with zip-off functionality. Made in G-1000 Air Stretch with organic cotton and partially recycled polyester, and pliant stretch fabric that is also made of partially recycled polyester. Both fabrics are quick drying with excellent air circulation. Perfect for hiking and travelling when you sometimes need shorts and sometimes need trousers to protect against sun, terrain or insects.
name: Fjallraven Abisko Midsummer Zip-Off Trousers - Mens
